instructions.title: How to play?
instructions.label1: Guess the hidden word in five tries.
instructions.label2: Each guess must be a valid 5-letter word.
instructions.label3: After each attempt the color of the letters changes to show how close you are to getting the word right.
instructions.label4: The letter G is in the word and in the correct position.
instructions.label5: The letter C is in the word but in the wrong position.
instructions.label6: The letter O is not in the word.
instructions.label7: There may be repeated letters. The clues are independent for each letter.
